name: LOADED_EXTERNAL_CVG_DATA
description: Clarity table for no-add single items in LCI.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the loaded coverage information record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record linked to the External ID bundle associated with this external coverage data.

columns.name: EXT_DEMOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the External Demographic Set that this external coverage is loaded to.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CVG_PAYER_ID
columns.description: The Payer ID for the associated external coverage.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CVG_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The plan ID for the associated external coverage.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CVG_SUB_IDENT
columns.description: The ID of the subscriber for the associated external coverage.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CVG_SUB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the subscriber for the associated external coverage.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CVG_SUB_DOB_DATE
columns.description: The date of birth of the subscriber for the associated external coverage.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CVG_SUB_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: The sex of the subscriber for the associated external coverage.

columns.name: EXT_CVG_MEM_REL_TO_SUB_C_NAME
columns.description: The member's relationship to the subscriber for the associated external coverage.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CVG_GROUP_NUM
columns.description: The group number for the associated external coverage.

columns.name: EXT_CVG_SOURCE_SYSTEM_C_NAME
columns.description: The external source that sent the external coverage information.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CVG_MEMBER_IDENT
columns.description: The member's insurance ID for the associated external coverage.
